page.title: 17DAY IN LIFE OF AIRLINE PILOT
page.content: { ANDY,LOCAL RESIDENT & AIRLINE PILOT. We are a family of 5, with 3 children Ben 6,Kate 4 & Thomas 3 months.We have lived in a 250 yr.old brick & flint cottage for 11 yrs.My wife Sue drives me to work & collects me.(45 mins. via Marlow &the M4 to{Heathrow.}) My duties on arrival,after meeting the Captain & Engineer,are to collect the documentation (flight plan,logs, weather etc.),proceed to the aircraft & do the pre_flight checks.During flight I am responsible for communications & monitoring the flight path & actions of the Captain & Engineer. I fly all over the world. My shortest trip is 2 days & longest 14 days away. I enjoy flying, visiting different places,being free from commuting & a 9_5 day & it's restrictions.I don't like having to work through the night & Christmas Day
